borrow-screen: Borrow - Hit C to mimic door closing
return-screen: Return - Hit C to mimic door closing
index-quote: The more we share the more we have
accept-terms: By clicking "Continue" I accept the Terms and Conditions
reset-instructions: Please go to www.munasafn.is on your own device to reset your password.
something-wrong:
Something went wrong.
Please try again later
collect-item: Please collect item and close to continue
return-item: Insert item inside the shelf and close to continue
all-tools-back: All tools are back at home ready to be shared with others.
maintenance-instr:
If any of the tools need maintenance please check it on the list.
Continue and follow the instructions
sign-up-instr: Please go to www.munasafn.is on your own device to sign up.
